price: Boniayεfoͻ no adwen ne sε, wͻ bεsͻ wo ahwε, atwe wo afri deε Yayi ama woͻ no ho, sεdeε wobefri εno akyi atwa nkontompo ato Yεn soͻ, (na sε εba saa deε a) εneε anka wͻ bεfa wo adamfoͻ.
arabic: وَإِن كَادُواْ لَيَفۡتِنُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ لِتَفۡتَرِيَ عَلَيۡنَا غَيۡرَهُۥۖ وَإِذٗا لَّٱتَّخَذُوكَ خَلِيلٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-in kādū layaftinūnaka ʿani alladhī awḥaynā ilayka litaftariya ʿalaynā ghayrahu wa-idhan la-ittakhadhūka khalīlan
